conbody.p: Users registering with a valid email are eligible for a 30-day trial of both Katalon Studio Enterprise (KSE) per-User and Katalon Runtime Engine (KRE) floating licenses.

ul.li: The trial licenses for Katalon Studio Enterprise and Katalon Runtime Engine are automatically generated and activated when you first log into the Katalon Studio application.

conbody.p: Each trial license can be activated on only one machine at a time.

You can start using KSE and KRE for 30 days. When your trial period expires, you need to purchase licenses to continue using KSE and KRE, or you can use the Katalon Studio free license with basic testing features.

li.p: For Offline licenses, you cannot remove a machine ID registered for the trial licenses once it has been activated.

conbody.p: To purchase licenses, see Purchase Katalon License.
To activate trial licenses, see Activate Katalon License.
